text: Q7.2 1 Point Indicate whether the following statement is True or False: If some ranking R is consistent with T', then the reverse of R (obtained by listing the last element of R first, and so on) must also be consistent with T. True False Q7.3 1 Point Write down a small instance of the problem when n = 3 that has no consistent ranking. (Don't use latex formatting in this and other free form questions.)
